thread.section_title: MyUS.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MyUS.com | myus2.myus.com
thread.title: Taher K

author: Taher K
title: Taher K
text:
There are multiple freight forwarders out there but MyUs.com is up there with the toppers. It has a great GUI screen with all relevant information up there. The charges are reasonable but also seem to be at the higher scale when compared to service providers of the similar style.
What stands out is the customer service with very eager and keen staff to retain customers and always providing quick and informative feedback.
The annual fee for a premium account is worth it if you use them often over a year
